title: The developer shall be responsible for replacement or repairs of any damage occurred during the period of license
clause_text: The developer shall be responsible for replacement or repairs of any damage occurred during the period of license. The charges for documentation and registration fee shall be borne by the developer.
section: REGULATIONS RELATING TO REHABILITATION AND FREE SALE COMPONENTS â€“
